components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
1. set up kitchen sink
2. run in emulator
3. go to any webview example
4. program exits and restarts

[WARN][dalvikm(660)]JNI WARNING: jarray points to non-array object

Tom,

can you please specify which TiSDK are you using? Also, is this happening also on Android devices or only on the emulator?
Will re-open if a response is received.
Re-opening due to triage tag. But hopefully this will notify the reporter ;P
We believe this was fixed by the linked issue. Please reopen if it's not the case.
